ComicInfo.Summary: …Live or Let Die!: Brute is captured by Chief Frazier’s officers, but escapes again. Crazed scientist Dr. Rolf Hendrick, spurned by the U.S. Defense Department, releases his fabricated cyborg, the megalomaniacal Doomstalker, who attacks Brute and seemingly defeats him.
ComicInfo.Title: …Live or Let Die!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
